name: NexLogiQ Amazon S3 Links Generator
author: NexLogiQ, Sachit Tandukar

sections.description:
NexLogiQ Amazon S3 Links Generator allows you to generate temporary link for files that are stored in Amazon S3 buckets.
You can set time limit for how long (in minutes) you want end users to be able to access temporary links.

Requirements

  • You must have Amazon S3 account;
  • You must generate Amazon S3 access key id and secret access key from your account. You can get guide from this link

Privacy notices

This plugin does not:

  • track users by any means;
  • send any critical data to external servers;
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire nex-aws-link-generate folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with NexLogiQ Amazon S3 Links Generator? Use these support channels appropriately.

  1. Contact
  2. Support forum

short_description: Simple plugin that helps you generate temporary link for file in Amazon S3 buckets
